item.title: Memories
item.description:
Photography and travel have always gone hand in hand, and for good reason. Traveling to new places provides photographers with endless opportunities to capture breathtaking landscapes, interesting people, and unique cultures. Through my travels, I’ve learned that photography isn’t just about taking pretty pictures, it’s about telling a story. Each photograph captures a moment in time, a feeling, a memory that can be revisited over and over again.

Photo by Jamie Street on Unsplash

item.title: Califonia
item.description:
Photography and travel have always gone hand in hand, and for good reason. Traveling to new places provides photographers with endless opportunities to capture breathtaking landscapes, interesting people, and unique cultures. Through my travels, I’ve learned that photography isn’t just about taking pretty pictures, it’s about telling a story. Each photograph captures a moment in time, a feeling, a memory that can be revisited over and over again.

It’s easy to get stuck in our own little worlds, but traveling forces us out of our comfort zones and exposes us to new ideas, people, and ways of life.

item.title: Creating Engaging Videos for Your YouTube Channel
item.description:
In today’s digital age, video has become a powerful medium for storytelling, entertainment, and education. Whether you’re a filmmaker, content creator, or simply passionate about sharing your experiences, harnessing the potential of video can open up a world of creative possibilities.

Define Your Content Niche:

As a filmmaker, your unique perspective and storytelling ability shape the way audiences perceive the world. Through the art of visual storytelling, you have the opportunity to evoke emotions, provoke thoughts, and inspire change. Embrace your creativity and use video as a tool to make a meaningful impact.

item.title: Crafting Compelling Content That Captivates
item.description:
In today’s digital age, video has become a powerful medium for storytelling, entertainment, and education. Whether you’re a filmmaker, content creator, or simply passionate about sharing your experiences, harnessing the potential of video can open up a world of creative possibilities.

As a filmmaker, your unique perspective and storytelling ability shape the way audiences perceive the world. item.title: Building a Thriving Channel from Scratch
item.description:
In today’s digital age, video has become a powerful medium for storytelling, entertainment, and education. Whether you’re a filmmaker, content creator, or simply passionate about sharing your experiences, harnessing the potential of video can open up a world of creative possibilities.

As a filmmaker, your unique perspective and storytelling ability shape the way audiences perceive the world. Through the art of visual storytelling, you have the opportunity to evoke emotions, provoke thoughts, and inspire change. Embrace your creativity and use video as a tool to make a meaningful impact.

item.title: Boosting Traffic and Engaging Your Audience
item.description:
Aesthetics and visual storytelling go hand in hand. Pay attention to composition, lighting, color grading, and sound design to create a visually appealing and immersive experience for your viewers. Experiment with different techniques, styles, and editing approaches to develop your unique visual signature as a filmmaker.

Building a loyal and engaged audience on YouTube requires consistent effort and engagement. Engage with your viewers by responding to comments, asking for feedback, and involving them in your content creation process. Foster a sense of community and make your viewers feel valued and appreciated.

item.title: Bike Trip
item.description:
Photography and travel have always gone hand in hand, and for good reason. Traveling to new places provides photographers with endless opportunities to capture breathtaking landscapes, interesting people, and unique cultures. Through my travels, I’ve learned that photography isn’t just about taking pretty pictures, it’s about telling a story. Each photograph captures a moment in time, a feeling, a memory that can be revisited over and over again.

One of the greatest things about travel photography is the ability to share your experiences with others. I love nothing more than being able to take someone on a visual journey through my photographs, sharing the sights, sounds, and emotions of my travels with them. Whether it’s through social media, a blog, or a photo album, photography allows us to share our adventures and inspire others to get out and explore the world.

item.title: About
item.description:
Chih-Chien Hsieh is a Ph.D. student in the Information Engineering and Applications Division of the Department of Engineering Science at National Cheng Kung University. His research interests include machine learning, deep learning, big data analytics, and financial risk modeling. His current research focuses on the detection of corporate financial risk and fraudulent behavior using advanced machine learning and data-driven methods.

Education

  • Ph.D. in Engineering Science (Computer Science and Applications Division), National Cheng Kung University (2025–Present)
    • Advisor: Prof. Mu-Yen Chen, Distinguished Professor
    • Laboratory: Data Science and Computational Thinking
  • M.B.A. in Insurance and Finance, National Taichung University of Science and Technology (2016–2018)
    • Advisor: Prof. Feng-Jui Hsu, Associate Professor
  • B.B.A. in Insurance and Finance, National Taichung University of Science and Technology (2014–2016)

Experience

  • Junior Manager, Fubon Life Insurance Co., Ltd. – Taipei, Taiwan (2022–2025)
  • Specialist, Nan Shan Life Insurance Co., Ltd. – Taipei, Taiwan (2020–2022)

Certificate

  • Fellow, Life Management Institute (FLMI), LOMA (Life Office Management Association), 2025
  • Project Management Professional (PMP), Project Management Institute, 2024

Expertise

Artificial Intelligence • Machine Learning • Deep Learning • Big Data Analytics • Financial Risk Analytics

item.title: Contact
item.description:
如果你有任何問題，或是想要交流，可以透過 email 與我聯繫。

item.title: Publications
item.description:
Academic Thesis

  • Hsieh, C. C. and Hsu, F. J. (2018). A firm’s financial risk and tax avoidance behavior. Master’s thesis, Department of Insurance and Finance, National Taichung University of Science and Technology, Taichung, Taiwan.

Research Presentations

  • Hsu, F. J., Chen, S. H., and Hsieh, C. C. (2020). Sweet candy or bitter poison: The default risk under US Federal Reserve’s quantitative easing. The International Conference on Innovative Computing and Management Science (ICMS 2020), July 29, 2020, Yilan, Taiwan.
  • Hsu, F. J., Chen, S. H., and Hsieh, C. C. (2020). Corporate financial risk, financial market conditions, and firm’s tax avoidance behavior. The International Conference on Innovative Computing and Management Science (ICMS 2020), July 29, 2020, Yilan, Taiwan.
  • Hsu, F. J., and Hsieh, C. C. (2018). Financial risk and tax avoidance. The 21st Conference of Finance Theory and Practice, May 30, 2018, Taichung, Taiwan.
  • Hsu, F. J., and Hsieh, C. C. (2018). Macroeconomic conditions and firm’s tax avoidance behavior. The Annual Conference of Modern Accounting Literature Association, May 4, 2018, Taichung, Taiwan.

Research Projects

  • 以巨量探勘與科研能量為基礎之我國金融科技架構發展(1/2)，科技部計畫編號 MOST 106-2634-F-025-001-，擔任研究助理，執行期間 2017/07/01–2018/06/30。
